review: I would love this except for one thing. It seems it needs an excellent wireless connection to work properly. My wireless service is mediocre (I have a great router, just crappy comcast) It does not have a lot of buffering, so it stops and pauses a lot. I mean, a lot-a lot. Unless you have a fast and steady wireless service, I recommend getting a more powerful box with memory room for buffering.

review: The firestick was very easy to set-up, and I am very happy with the performance. Sometimes it does cut out, or run slowly, but I think that is more an issue with my internet than it is the Firestick itself. Also, as some other reviews have mentioned, it is very hard to open the remote for installing the batteries. But, not impossible.  Overall, I am very pleased!
